page.title: 10ST.MARY'S AND ST.ANNE'S
page.content: St.Mary's and St.Anne's are private schools.They were originally two seperate schools ,one for the rich and one for the poor.They were joined together in 1892. The founder of St.Annes was Canon Lowe.The children come from all parts of the world and start at te age of eight and leave when they are eighteen. They all wear a school uniform which is blue and during the winter they are allowed to wear a cape which is black with a red inside. The school employs a lot of the village people to carry out the running of the school. People are employed as cooks,cleaners,gardeners, and matrons to look after the children who board at the school.
